sourcesContent:
import { yupResolver } from "@hookform/resolvers/yup" import { FC } from "react" import { useForm } from "react-hook-form" import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom" import { login } from "../../../hooks/auth" import { LogUserType } from "../../../types/models" import { defaultValues } from "./defaultValues" import { validationSchema } from "./validationSchema" const LogUsers: FC = () =>{ const {handleSubmit, register} =useForm({ defaultValues, resolver: yupResolver(validationSchema), }) const {push} = useHistory() const onSubmit = async (data:LogUserType) =>{ const response = await login(data); localStorage.setItem("users", JSON.stringify(response)); push("/") } return(
No vamos a compartir tus datos con nadie más
Aún no tengo cuenta
Olvidé mi contraseña
) } export {LogUsers}
